questions.question: This show's alien language was changed twice due to viewers decoding it.
In this cartoon series about college, none of the students are ever seen attending class.
This show regularly featured commercials for the fictional company Veridian Dynamics.
This show features a character that wears jean cutoffs and refers to his condition as being a "nevernude".
This show famously had its pilot episode, which explained the setting and character backstories, aired as its final episode during its original run.
